{{HideSpoiler|Hand-to-Hand Combat}} |likes = [[Gabriel Agreste]] |alignment = Bad |dislikes = [[French Miraculous superhero team]] }} {{SpoilerButton}} {{Quote |They've been keeping you from achieving your dream for way too long. I will go to any length to end the reign of Ladybug and Cat Noir.|Nathalie|"[[Catalyst (Heroes' Day - Part 1)|Catalyst]]" |quotelink = yes }} '''Nathalie Sancoeur'''https://twitter.com/Thomas_Astruc/status/655411981617381376 is the secondary antagonist of [[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]] and [[Gabriel Agreste]]'s assistant who manages his work, [[Agreste mansion|mansion]] and takes care of his son [[Adrien]]. In "[[Catalyst (Heroes' Day - Part 1)|Catalyst]]", which is part of the "[[Heroes' Day]]" special, she is [[Akumatization|akumatized]] by [[Gabriel Agreste|Hawk Moth]] into '''Catalyst''', a power-enhancing supervillain. In "[[Mayura (Heroes' Day - Part 2)|Mayura]]", in order to help [[Gabriel Agreste|Hawk Moth]] escape from the [[French Miraculous superhero team]], Nathalie uses the [[Peacock Miraculous]] and, as the Miraculous is inhabited by [[Duusu]], she becomes '''Mayura''', a peacock-themed supervillain who helps Hawk Moth by creating [[Amokization#Amokized sentimonsters|allies]] for akumatized villains. She is said to appear as [[Gabriel Agreste|Hawk Moth]]'s "boss" in [[Season 3]].https://twitter.com/stelllalights/status/784490783810416640https://youtu.be/IsTygn5xxZs?t=396 == Appearance == === Physical appearance === Nathalie stands at an average adult height with black hair that is pulled back into a bun with the hair on the left side of her head that is dyed a dark pink or red color, a piece of hair hanging over her face and dull blue eyes. === Civilian attire === Nathalie has glasses with black and red striped frames and she wears periwinkle eye shadow. She wears a red turtleneck sweater, a black dress jacket, black pants and black medium-heel shoes. She also has round creamy-white earrings. === As Mayura === Mayura's eyes have pink irises and scleras that are pink which fade into dark indigo, and there is black liner around her eyes, resembling glasses. Her skin is a light indigo and her hair is dark blue, and part of it curls up underneath her left eye. She wears a peacock-feather-like cocktail hat, which is blue and tear-shaped with a light pink mark in the center and a light blue, translucent veil over her right eye. She wears a blue dress with a fuzzy black collar and sleeves that end in a point on the back of her hand. The dress appears to have a set hexagonal texture, as well as a Peacock Miraculous in the center. The bottom of the dress has a front-slit skirt, and the end of the skirt has rounded points with dark blue, light-pink-centered spots, resembling a peacock's tail feathers. The rounded points are edged with translucent light blue material. Underneath the dress, she has translucent indigo tights that are opaque from the knees down, making the opaque section resemble high-heeled boots. She holds a blue [[hand fan]], which is similar in design to the end of her skirt, and a peacock-feather-like object in her other hand. === As Catalyst === Catalyst has periwinkle skin. Over her head, while leaving her mouth exposed, she wears a black helmet with a red visor with black edges and a red spike pointing towards the back of her head. Catalyst also wears a black dress suit with stiff shoulders, including a dark red front and swan neck collar that features a red downward-arrow-shaped section in the center. The sleeves cover her entire arms, with the tips of her fingers fading into red. Also, Catalyst has pocket-like ridges on each side of her hips, and her pant legs come down to her feet, having red high-heels, soles, and tips. {{For2|more of Nathalie's outfits and designs|Nathalie Sancoeur/Designs}} == Personality == [[File:OR-2 (149).png|thumb|left|Nathalie reluctantly allows Adrien to enter the school.]] Nathalie is a serious and formal woman who works very diligently as [[Gabriel Agreste]]'s assistant. She has a cold and distant demeanor as she doesn't openly show her emotions around others most of the time. Smart and sensible, Nathalie is able to reason with Gabriel and Adrien whenever they are acting inconsiderately or emotionally, sometimes in relation to each other. While not warm, she can be cordial and polite. However, in situations where she is dealing with Gabriel, she becomes nervous, being afraid to disappoint him. Her desire to be on his good side leads her to unfair actions, such as giving Adrien a [[Adrien's scarf|birthday gift]] and claiming it is from Gabriel when it is actually from [[Marinette Dupain-Cheng|Marinette]] in "[[The Bubbler]]". She cares for Adrien, although she doesn't usually openly show it, as she requests to Gabriel that his son go to school on his behalf while she would handle his schedule, and she desires what is best for the Agreste family. [[File:Catalyst (98).png|thumb|Nathalie goes along with Gabriel's plan.]] However, her concern is limited to the Agreste family only, and she doesn't seem to care about the other Parisians' well-being. In fact, she obeys Gabriel's orders with fierce loyalty no matter how morally wrong they are and even helps him with his plans, which is seen in "[[Catalyst (Heroes' Day - Part 1)|Catalyst]]" and "[[Mayura (Heroes' Day - Part 2)|Mayura]]" as she takes sadistic joy in fooling the heroes into thinking they can win all the while. Even though Nathalie has a cool and calm demeanor, she can lose her temper on occasion and would disregard any detrimental consequences as a result, as seen in "Mayura", when she was frustrated by the fact that her boss was failing, and even went as far as letting herself be harmed by the power of the damaged [[Peacock Miraculous]] in her transformation. == Abilities == === As a civilian === Nathalie is an effective and objective assistant, being able to take care of Gabriel's needs and organize Adrien's schedule. === As Mayura === [[File:MA (512).png|thumb|left|A protector summoned by Mayura, a giant purple hawk moth, confronting the team of heroes.]] Mayura has enhanced physical characteristics: speed, strength, and agility. She showed considerable hand-to-hand combat skills and stealth against an injured Cat Noir and Queen Bee. Mayura shares similar abilities with Hawk Moth as she is able to infuse a feather plucked from her hand fan with her power, transforming it into an [[Amok]], and send it out to possess an object owned by a chosen target, with whom she can communicate telepathically. This action will then give an emotion from her target a physical form of that person's choosing, to act as the target's ally until recalled via a snap of her fingers, which destroys it. While Mayura is communicating, a blue curved peacock mask appears in front of her and her target's faces.https://twitter.com/MiraculousINTL/status/1011622625066586113  === As Catalyst === [[File:Catalyst (490).png|thumb|180px|Catalyst infusing Hawk Moth's cane, turning him into the powerful Scarlet Moth.]] Catalyst has the power to multiply/enhance/increase someone's powers; she does this by infusing scarlet energy into an object belonging to her target, similar to an [[list of akumatized objects|akumatized object]]. When affected, the person gains a red-colored outfit. In [[Gabriel Agreste|Hawk Moth]]'s case, with this power enhancement, he became Scarlet Moth, allowing him to [[Akumatization|akumatize]] multiple butterflies and transform multiple people at once. She can also communicate with the person she enhanced, during which a red sharp-edged butterfly mask appears in front of both of their faces, similar to Hawk Moth. == Relationships == === [[Gabriel Agreste|Gabriel Agreste/Hawk Moth]] === [[File:TB Distressed Nathalie 2.jpeg|thumb|left|Nathalie distressed by Gabriel's phone call.]] Nathalie works professionally as Gabriel's assistant. She makes sure to take care of all of his requests and looks after his son, Adrien. Occasionally, she tends to get nervous when dealing with him, such as when she forgot to buy a gift for Adrien on his behalf, leading her to lie and tell Adrien that Marinette's gift was actually from his father. Although wary of him becoming disappointed with her, she is willing to stand up to him for Adrien's sake, as when she voiced her displeasure with him for being too distracted by his missing [[Emilie Agreste|wife]] to see his own son's misery during "[[Santa Claws]]". [[File:TC (756).png|thumb|Nathalie watches as Gabriel enters his lair.]] In "[[The Collector]]", it is revealed that Nathalie is aware that Gabriel is Hawk Moth. Furthermore, "[[Queen Wasp (Queen's Battle - Part 2)|Queen Wasp]]" indicates that she has deep feelings for Gabriel, being relieved when he decides to stop being Hawk Moth but devastated when he changes his mind because he loves Emilie too much. Her loyalty is so strong that in "[[Catalyst (Heroes' Day - Part 1)|Catalyst]]", she helps with his plan for taking Ladybug's and Cat Noir’s Miraculouses by allowing him to akumatize her, and in "[[Mayura (Heroes' Day - Part 2)|Mayura]]", she even risks herself by using the damaged Peacock Miraculous to transform into the titular villain in order to help Gabriel after he, as Hawk Moth, gets de-transformed back into his normal villain form. {{HideSpoiler|According to her in "[[Stormy Weather 2]]", she admits having deep admiration for Gabriel and knows that it has presumably morphed into romantic feelings.}} === [[Adrien Agreste|Adrien Agreste/Cat Noir]] === [[File:TB (48).png|thumb|left|Nathalie gives Adrien his schedule.]] Nathalie is usually serious around Adrien, not being very warm or close to him. Despite this, she does care for him, which she shows when she requests to Gabriel that Adrien be allowed to go to school after seeing how much he wanted to attend. She also shows that she cares for Adrien in "Santa Claws" when she sees how sad he is about his father not celebrating Christmas, and asks Gabriel to spend time with his son. She even softly smiles at Adrien's joy at his friends being allowed into the mansion on Christmas. {{HideSpoiler|In "[[Stormy Weather 2]]", Nathalie claims to also have developed a great sense of affection for Adrien as she watched him grow up.}} Nathalie is unaware that Adrien is Cat Noir. However, she despises the hero and wants to help Gabriel take his Miraculous from him, even telling Hawk Moth that she'll go to any lengths to end his reign. === [[Marinette Dupain-Cheng|Marinette Dupain-Cheng/Ladybug]] === [[File:SS_(914).png|thumb|Ladybug and Nathalie entering Adrien's room.]] Nathalie has seldom encountered Marinette personally, only seeing her in person during the derby hat competition in "[[Mr. Pigeon]]" and briefly interacting with her in "[[Style Queen (Queen's Battle - Part 1)|Style Queen]]". However, on Adrien's birthday in "[[The Bubbler]]", she treats Marinette formally when on a speaker and disregards her by claiming to Adrien that Marinette's gift was from Gabriel. Nathalie is unaware that Marinette is Ladybug. However, she despises the hero and wishes to help Gabriel take her Miraculous, even telling Hawk Moth that she'll go to any lengths to end her reign. === [[Chloé Bourgeois|Chloé Bourgeois/Queen Bee]] === Like most Parisian citizens, Nathalie is aware that Chloé is Queen Bee. Though she does express a little bit of doubt about it, Nathalie willingly helps Gabriel in his plot to bring Chloé over to his side. As Mayura, while battling her, she tries to persuade Chloé into joining her and Hawk Moth by saying that if she does, she can be Queen Bee whenever she likes, though Chloé refuses. {{SpoilerButton}} {{HideSpoiler| ===[[Duusu]]=== Nathalie uses her to transform into Mayura. While their relationship hasn't been much explored, it is clear that Duusu cares for Nathalie, as she gets upset when Nathalie collapses after using the [[Peacock Miraculous]] in "[[Reflekdoll]]".}} {{History}} == Sightings == === Episodes === {{AppearancesS1|TB=yes|MP=yes|TM=yes|SS=yes|VL=yes|OR=yes|SH=yes}} {{AppearancesS2|OP=sil|SC=yes|FN=yes|TC=yes|SY=yes|FZ=back|SQ=yes|QW=yes|GL=yes|SB=yes|GZ=yes|CA=yes|CH=yes|MA=yes}} {{AppearancesS3|OP=sil|WD=yes|SW2=yes|LB=yes|AM=yes|OB=p|OC=yes|MR=yes|TT=yes|PC=yes|PT2=yes|RD=yes|FT=yes|MQ=yes}} {{AppearancesAMM|ADL=yes|MAF=back|MAD=back|PG=yes|NO=back}} === Other === {{AppearancesGames|RUN=p}} == Trivia == {{SpoilerButton}} * The name '''Nathalie''' means "Christmas Day/Christmas". * Nathalie's surname '''Sancoeur''' ("sans cœur") means "heartless" or "without a heart" in French. * Nathalie appears to be left-handed as she does most things with her left hand like holding a stylus in her left hand during "Ladybug and Cat Noir (Origins - Part 1)". * Nathalie's akumatized form, Catalyst, was first revealed in a promotional video for Season 2 from TFOU.https://pandasuite.com/viewer/2.0.2/59a6c26e48abe6f53a002dc9?t=1 (direct video source [https://data.pandasuite.com/videos/59a3e7def643f27d7300131b-universal_1024_1024_20_main_3-0.mp4 here]) * Catalyst also shares a resemblance with the Collector's design as they both have purplish skin, red glass over their eyes and black dress suits with stiff shoulders. * Nathalie is the first character to explicitly be willingly akumatized (aside from [[Gabriel Agreste]] akumatizing himself in "[[The Collector]]"), although [[Lila Rossi]]'s smirk after her de-evilization implies she may have also been willing to serve his scheme. * Catalyst is so far the only [[Akumatized villains|akumatized villain]] not to be defeated by the [[French Miraculous superhero team]] and the only one they are not aware of. * Following [[Alya Césaire]], [[Nino Lahiffe]], and [[Chloé Bourgeois]], Nathalie is the fourth person to become a Miraculous holder and akumatized villain, excluding Gabriel, who akumatized himself. * Catalyst is also the first akumatized villain to enter Hawk Moth's lair, aside from The Collector. ** She is also the first akumatized villain who didn't fight Ladybug and Cat Noir. * The name '''Mayura''' in Sanskrit means peacock, one of the sacred birds in Hindu mythology. It is also a contemporary Hindu name used in many parts of India.https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%82%E0%A4%B0#Sanskrit ** While the villain is female, '''Mayura''' is specifically the term for males while '''Mayuri''' is the term for females. * Mayura was revealed at the Miraculous panel at New York Comic Con 2016 under the name "Le Paon" (French for "The Peacock"). ** Earlier, at a panel at San Diego Comic Con, [[Thomas Astruc]] pointed to an image of her in the sneak peek collage image, commenting that she will be a new recurring supervillain that will be Hawk Moth's ally.https://youtu.be/vtO8bbvmU0g?t=1561 ** In a video interview held on August 25, [[Jeremy Zag]] mentioned that the new main villain will make Hawk Moth appear like "a baby" in comparison.https://youtu.be/n1avxPB4txE ** Her final name was revealed at a TF1 press conference advertising the upcoming Season 3.https://twitter.com/MiraculousINTL/status/1011622625066586113 * Mayura's civilian identity was revealed by the end of [[Season 2]].https://www.pscp.tv/w/1yNxaqRQrMqxj ([https://youtu.be/tBGO07cb0Aw?t=1740 exact moment here]) ** There were also clues about her in the opening theme song for the season. * She’s the second Miraculous holder to use their power for evil after Gabriel Agreste. * She's also the first Miraculous holder whose skin tone changes color when she transforms. * Nathalie is the only person who knows Hawk Moth's secret identity, which is [[Gabriel Agreste]]. {{HideSpoiler| * Nathalie appears to be suffering from prolonged health issues as a result of using the Peacock Miraculous.}} {{Gallery|image = 1550175800899.png}} {{Reflist}} {{Characters}} [[de:Nathalie Sancoeur]] [[es:Nathalie Sancoeur]] [[fr:Nathalie Sancœur]] [[pl:Nathalie Sancoeur]] [[pt-br:Nathalie Sancoeur]] [[ru:Натали Санкёр]] [[Category:Miraculous holders]] [[Category:Villains]] [[Category:Peacock Miraculous holders]] [[Category:Female Characters]] [[Category:Adults]] [[Category:Akumatized villains]] [[Category:Recurring Characters]]

{{WW Spoiler}} {{Infobox character |name= Future Queen Bee |image= 69180585 628858807623734 1307070550302343494 n.jpg |gender = Female |occupation= Superhero |affiliations= [[Miraculous holders]] |friends= [[Pollen]] |enemies= [[Gabriel Agreste|Hawk Moth]] |wieldedmiraculous= bee |abilities= [[Venom]] |weapons= [[Spinning top]] }} The '''future Queen Bee''' is the [[Bee Miraculous]] [[Miraculous holders|holder]] who will succeed [[Chloé Bourgeois]].
== Appearance == === Physical appearance === In her civilian identity, she has platinum-blonde hair.
=== As Queen Bee === As Queen Bee, she wears a yellow and black, bee-themed skin tight outfit.
== Personality == She will be "very sweet".<ref>https://twitter.com/RedSuitedLady/status/1166416038247981058</ref>
== Abilities == Presuming this holder has the same abilities as the most recent Bee Miraculous holder, Chloé, this holder has enhanced physical characteristics such as speed, strength and agility. They also have the superpower [[Venom]], enabling them to immobilize their opponents.

[[File:Thomas_Astruc.jpg|240px|thumb|center|link=Thomas Astruc]]
Thomas Astruc is the creator and a co-director, producer and writer for ''[[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]]''.

Thomas worked on ''Code Lyoko'', ''W.I.T.C.H.'', and Season 2 of ''The Daltons'' as a storyboard artist, and on ''Totally Spies!'' as the storyboard supervisor. He is also known for his work as a storyboard artist on ''Wasabi'' (2001) and ''Asterix and Obelix Meet Cleopatra'' (2002). At some point while ''Miraculous'' was being made, he was a guest artist for ''[[w:c:Lolirock|LoliRock]]'' on the episode "Batty", storyboarding the second half of the episode and revising the episode's script.
[[Thomas Astruc|Read more >]]

[[File:ML S3 Poster.jpg|250px|link=Season 3]]

The first thirteen episodes of '''[[Season 3]]''' is now available on Netflix in the US.
[[Category:Templates]]

*The first twelve episodes of [[Season 3]] officially premiered on Netflix on August 1, 2019. *As revealed during the San Diego Comic-Con 2018 panel, the new [[Miraculous Zag Chibi]] series premiered on August 31, 2018, on the official Miraculous Ladybug YouTube channel. *It was [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p1Oe-v_rJpA&t=2860s announced] that the [[Miraculous Ladybug & Cat Noir]] mobile app would have a new update that features [[Alya Césaire|Rena Rouge]] as a playable character on August 2018. This update has not been rolled out yet. *A [[Miraculous Live]] musical is currently in production and it is set to open in North America in March 2019. *The official Miraculous Ladybug Tumblr blog [https://officialmiraculousladybug.tumblr.com/post/157210066237/will-the-official-ladybug-art-book-be-available-in announced] that the [[Ladybug Artbook]] will be released in the US in late 2017. *The entire [[Season 1|first season]] of ''Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir'' is now available on Netflix in the US. **The fifth DVD from [https://www.shoutfactory.com/product/miraculous-tales-of-ladybug-cat-noir-season-one Shout Factory! Kids], containing the entire first season episodes have officially released on February 6, 2018. *As revealed by Lindalee Rose in a [http://aminoapps.com/web/x19665645/blog/19517bb4-91cc-44a7-aee1-24321fd656d5 few] [http://aminoapps.com/web/x19665645/blog/7207cec2-7384-4d35-a0d0-f8b425fba654 posts] on the Miraculous Amino app, the [[Miraculous (film)|''Miraculous'' film]] has been pushed back to 2020, and [[Season 2]] or [[Season 3]] will have a [[Miraculous holders|Miraculous holder]] with an unknown [[Miraculouses|Miraculous]].

revision.comment: The official miraculous ladybug account wanted us to link a way to buy the series, so uh, here it is
revision.text:

revision.text:
<noinclude>This page contains the family tree connected to [[Alya Césaire]].
== Césaire Family Tree == </noinclude>=== Tree === <tabber> |-|Images = {{Césaire Tree/Images}} |-|Text Only = {{Césaire Tree/Text}} </tabber>
{{FTK}} === Notes === * All of the Césaires' first names are based on famous jazz singers. * Marlena is the only member of the Césaire family so far not to be akumatized. <noinclude> [[Category:Family Tree Templates]]</noinclude>

key_80="{{{80|}}}"|tst_80_{{{80|a}}}{{{80|b}}}=undef|text_80={{{{{{80}}}}}}|boxstyle_80={{{boxstyle_{{{80}}}|}}}| undef=}}Tool for family trees. ==The Basics== In the familytree sections, you put "boxes" separated with pipes, and they translate to symbols. The basics: 
{{familytree/start|sample tree}}
{{familytree|MK|y|UN|}}
{{familytree| |,|-|^|-|.| |}}
{{familytree|JK| |AK|}}
{{familytree/end}}
This gives: {{familytree/start|sample tree}} {{familytree|MK|y|UN|}} {{familytree| |,|-|^|-|.| |}} {{familytree|JK| |AK|}} {{familytree/end}} Next, add cat names to the boxes like this: 
{{familytree/start|sample tree}}
{{familytree|MK|y|UN|MK=[[Mr. Kubdel]]|UN=Unknown}}
{{familytree| |,|-|^|-|.| |}}
{{familytree|JK| |AK|JK=[[Jalil Kubdel]]|AK=[[Alix Kubdel]]}}
{{familytree/end}}
Giving: {{familytree/start|sample tree}} {{familytree|MK|y|UN|MK=[[Mr. Kubdel]]|UN=Unknown}} {{familytree| |,|-|^|-|.| |}} {{familytree|JK| |AK|JK=[[Jalil Kubdel]]|AK=[[Alix Kubdel]]}} {{familytree/end}} And you can color the boxes: 
{{familytree/start|sample tree}}
{{familytree|MK|y|UN|MK=[[Mr. Kubdel]]|UN=Unknown
|boxstyle_MK=background-color: #D3EBFD;
|boxstyle_UN=background-color: #FFDAE0;}}
{{familytree| |,|-|^|-|.| |}}
{{familytree|JK| |AK|JK=[[Jalil Kubdel]]|AK=[[Alix Kubdel]]
|boxstyle_JK=background-color: #D3EBFD;
|boxstyle_AK=background-color: #FFDAE0;}}
{{familytree/end}}
Giving: {{familytree/start|sample tree}} {{familytree|MK|y|UN|MK=[[Mr. Kubdel]]|UN=Unknown |boxstyle_MK=background-color: #D3EBFD; |boxstyle_UN=background-color: #FFDAE0;}} {{familytree| |,|-|^|-|.| |}} {{familytree|JK| |AK|JK=[[Jalil Kubdel]]|AK=[[Alix Kubdel]] |boxstyle_JK=background-color: #D3EBFD; |boxstyle_AK=background-color: #FFDAE0;}} {{familytree/end}} ==More Info== Check [[wikipedia:Template:Familytree|this article]] on wikipedia for advanced usage and the explanation of all symbols. [[Category:Family Tree Template Tools|{{PAGENAME}}]]

<noinclude>This page contains the family tree connected to [[Adrien Agreste]].
== Agreste Family Tree == </noinclude>=== Tree === <tabber> |-|Images = {{Agreste Tree/Images}} |-|Text Only = {{Agreste Tree/Text}} </tabber> {{FTK}} === Notes === * Emilie Agreste mysteriously disappeared before the events of [[Season 1]]. In "[[Style Queen (Queen's Battle - Part 1)|Style Queen]]" and "[[Queen Wasp (Queen's Battle - Part 2)|Queen Wasp]]", it was revealed that she is underneath the Agreste Mansion in the same room seen in "[[Gorizilla]]", inside something resembling a coffin, in what appears to be in a comatose state. <noinclude> [[Category:Family Tree Templates]]</noinclude>

<choose> <!-- Wayzz --> <option>{{Quote|Please, Master, be reasonable.|Wayzz|"[[Ladybug & Cat Noir (Origins - Part 1)|Ladybug & Cat Noir]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Do you think [Marinette and Adrien]'ll be up to it, Master?|Wayzz|"[[Ladybug & Cat Noir (Origins - Part 1)|Ladybug & Cat Noir]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Thanks to the magic jewels, we were finally able to communicate with the humans and help them. It felt so good to finally feel useful!|Wayzz|[[Miraculous Adventures Issue 2|''Miraculous Adventures'' Issue 2]]|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|You should have given [Marinette] the kwami of lateness, Master!|Wayzz|[[Miraculous Adventures Issue 2|''Miraculous Adventures'' Issue 2]]|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<!-- Default --> <option>{{Quote|Excellent choice, Master.|Wayzz|"[[Stoneheart (Origins - Part 2)|Stoneheart]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option></choose>

This page will be updated as soon as we get stronger new sources. |} [[Category:Articles with outdated sources]] [[Category:Notice templates]] [[Category:Utility templates]]

This page contains the family tree connected to [[Nino Lahiffe]]. == Lahiffe Family Tree == === Tree === |-|Images = {{Lahiffe Tree/Images}} |-|Text Only = {{Lahiffe Tree/Text}} {{FTK}} Notes * The official Miraculous Ladybug Tumblr blog revealed that Nino's family was originally supposed to be revealed in [[Season 2]].https://officialmiraculousladybug.tumblr.com/post/159164542707/hi-i-wanted-to-ask-if-we-would-get-to-see-ninosIt was pushed to a future season for unknown reasons. ** Later, the writers revealed at an event that Nino has a younger relative named [[Chris Lahiffe|Chris]].[https://youtu.be/tBGO07cb0Aw?t=1508 New info] released at an event at ZAG Studios on May 17, 2017. {{Reflist}} [[Category:Family Tree Templates]]

revision.comment: Add quote recently singled out for Chloé's page, plus a few punctuation tweaks
revision.text:
<choose> <!-- Chloé --> <option>{{Quote|Ridiculous! Utterly ridiculous!|Chloé||quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Um, hi Mr. Agreste. I'm Chloé Bourgeois. You know my father, André Bourgeois, the mayor?|Chloé|"[[Mr. Pigeon]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Hey there! Hi! You look totally fab! Uh, no, not you. Hey, it's still a month from Halloween, you know?|Chloé|"[[Lady Wifi]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Everybody adores me.|Chloé|"[[The Evillustrator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Yeesss! Ladybug just said I'm adorable! I totally need a picture of the two of us together!|Chloé|"[[The Evillustrator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Good! Let's call Ladybug! I'm sure ''she'll'' actually do something!|Chloé|"[[Rogercop]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Ugh! I never said 18-karat gold! Those gold tones will never match my 24-karat toilet!|Chloé|"[[Dark Cupid]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|My hair! There is nothing worse in this world than a bad hair day! First, Ladybug wrinkles my new jacket. Second, you totally ruined my hair!|Chloé|"[[Dark Cupid]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|It's a good thing I come up with brilliant ideas like this. [...] We can just relax, and let Cat Noir and Ladybug do all the hard work. |Chloé|"[[Horrificator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I've watched how my daddy wins every election, and I'm going to follow in his footsteps. I know just how to win!|Chloé|"[[Darkblade]]|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Wow! You can actually accomplish something when you put ''my'' mind to it!|Chloé|"[[Darkblade]]|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Pizza...? Eugh, don't get that peasant food anywhere near me!|Chloé|"[[Princess Fragrance]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Ahahahahaha, you're flattering me. It ''is'' so kind of me though, isn't it?|Chloé|"[[Princess Fragrance]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|You have no idea who you're dealing with. My daddy, the Mayor, will bring in the police, the army, the entire cavalry!|Chloé|"[[Stoneheart (Origins - Part 2)|Stoneheart]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Help! I promise I'll be nice to everyone, say please and thank you all — I didn't promise.|Chloé|"[[Stoneheart (Origins - Part 2)|Stoneheart]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Excuse me! You can't be a guest at this hotel! My father only allows the most important celebrities, like me.|Chloé|"[[Pixelator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Oh my, you're flattering me. Keep going.|Chloé|"[[Pixelator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Scared, moi? As if! No way!|Chloé|"[[Pixelator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Hi, Adrikins! There you are! Amazing Chloé has got a surprise for you!|Chloé|"[[Guitar Villain]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Is Chloé the best, or is Chloé the best?|Chloé|"[[Guitar Villain]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Go on, rugrats! Don't forget to take your thumbs out of your mouths!|Chloé|"[[Reflekta]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|What in the — do you realize how much my outfit cost?!|Chloé|"[[Reflekta]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Those were so last season, these didn't cost nearly enough, and those are never in season! Ugh, I hate all of these!|Chloé|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Ladybug! I knew you'd come to save me — you know, considering what good friends we are!|Chloé|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I never have run-ins with anyone. Everybody absolutely loves me.|Chloé|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|That's the problem! ''You'' never know ''anything!'' That crocodile has a larger brain than you! Get out! I never want to see you again!|Chloé|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|You can count on me, Hawk Moth! There will only be one heroine in Paris: me, Antibug!|Antibug|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Yeah, yeah. You can show me your gratitude later; class is starting.|Chloé|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Can't you see I'm trying to relax here? Go sweep somewhere else, Cinderella.|Chloé|"[[Despair Bear]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|They all seemed to enjoy getting dirty making cookies. How's it any different than getting dirty cleaning floors? They should be thanking me, if anything. |Chloé|"[[Despair Bear]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I'm not your servant!|Chloé|"[[Despair Bear]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Hey, I was really nice just then. Did you see? No? You're all so lame!|Chloé|"[[Despair Bear]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Without me, Ladybug and Cat Noir would never have succeeded. I'm even better than you superheroes!|Chloé|"[[Despair Bear]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I'm suddenly feeling very generous. I think that thing of yours about being nice might actually make some sense.|Chloé|"[[Despair Bear]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Unhh! Too disgusting for comment.|Chloé|"[[Despair Bear]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I know. I'm breathtaking.|Chloé|"[[Frightningale]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I am Chloé Bourgeois, and from now on ''I'll'' be your new superhero: Queen Bee! We'll soon see if you think Dupain-Cheng is still more exceptional than ''moi''!|Queen Bee|"[[Queen Wasp (Queen's Battle - Part 2)|Queen Wasp]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Of course, you couldn't afford to buy a designer dress like me. I'd show it to you, but I don't want you to drool all over it with envy. Anyway, you wasted too much of my precious time already.|Chloé|"[[Inspiration]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<!-- Others -->
<option>{{Quote|Chloé? Seriously? She's too self-absorbed to think of anyone but herself, much less save the world.|[[Nino Lahiffe]]|"[[Lady Wifi]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|[Chloé]'s no superhero, she's super-psycho!|[[Alya Césaire]]|"[[Lady Wifi]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|And besides, who would believe that Chloé's the original Ladybug? She's obviously just a die-hard fan. A... copycat?|[[Marinette Dupain-Cheng|Ladybug]]|"[[Lady Wifi]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Sorry, Tikki... Chloé! She just...fires up this little red bug!|[[Marinette Dupain-Cheng]]|"[[The Evillustrator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|If you knew [Chloé], you wouldn't be breaking a sweat to save her skin! She's the real baddie!|[[Nathaniel Kurtzberg|The Evillustrator]]|"[[The Evillustrator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Chloé lent [her beret] to me. She really is my BFF! Chloé! Your geography homework's ready!|[[Sabrina Raincomprix]]|"[[The Evillustrator]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Don't you dare put a finger on my little girl!|[[André Bourgeois]]|"[[Rogercop]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I don't need to waste this arrow on you. Your heart is so dark and shriveled, there's no room for love!|[[Lê Chiến Kim|Dark Cupid]]|"[[Dark Cupid]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I've known Chloé since I was a little kid. I know she's not perfect, but I can't throw her under the bus.|[[Adrien Agreste]]|"[[Stoneheart (Origins - Part 2)|Stoneheart]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|I'm not putting up with your crud anymore, Chloé, and neither is anyone else around here. So take your attitude and go on, get lost!|[[Marinette Dupain-Cheng]]|"[[Stoneheart (Origins - Part 2)|Stoneheart]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Chloé speaking in the third person? Totally annoying.|[[Tikki]]|"[[Guitar Villain]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Damaging my daughter's reputation is the same as soiling the reputation of the Mayor of Paris, uh, which is me. An attack on Chloé is an attack on Paris.|[[André Bourgeois]]|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<option>{{Quote|Did you see that? Chloé smiled nicely! Kinda.|[[Marinette Dupain-Cheng]]|"[[Antibug]]"|quotelink = yes}}</option>
<!-- Default --> </option>{{Quote|"Boo-hoo-hoo! I'm so sorry, Miss, but after what happened at the library, I simply couldn't work on my project! It would've been too traumatic! Just look what it's done to my-my hair!" ...Oh, please. Who's going to believe that?! Even a stupid hairdryer couldn't make me look bad.|Chloé|"[[The Evillustrator]]"|quotelink = yes}}<option> </choose>
